Text.Name: SYS_LOST
Text.Desc: A lost building that nobody recognizes. \n(Empty.)

Text.Name: RebornSelf
Text.Desc: Unique secret technique of the Taiyi Sect. Using the Soul Pearl as the catalyst, this technique destroys one's own cultivation and burns out their Golden Core. Thus the way of creation is reversed and one will be reincarnated as a mortal.

Text.Name: JieHuiDaoPowerUp
Text.Desc: Consume one Tribulation Ashe and use on an item, granting a chance to increase the item's tier by 1.

Text.Name: SoulCrystalYouPowerUp
Text.Desc: Consume one Anguish Soul Gem to use on one item, with a chance to increase the tier of the item by 1.

Text.Name: SoulCrystalLingPowerUp
Text.Desc: Consume one Spirit Soul Gem to use on one item, with a chance to increase the Qi Containment Rate of the item (if the item is an artifact, raises Qi Capacity instead).

Text.Name: MakeSoulCrystal
Text.Desc: Use on an uncultivated character, dying character or Sentient Spirits to collect their Soul Gem. Can only be used once on each target.

Text.Name: MakePuppet
Text.Desc: Use on dead body to awaken it. The awakened body can undertake simple physical labor, with quality related to its cultivational state while it was alive. \n[color=#D06508]Each cultivator can only control one vessel.[/color]

Text.Name: BuidPuppet
Text.Desc: Release upon a vessel to endow it with soul. The ensouled vessel can undertake simple physical labor, with quality related to its tier when crafted. \n[color=#D06508]Each cultivator can only control one vessel.[/color]

Text.Name: SeachSoul
Text.Desc: Use on a dying character and you have a certain chance to obtain their secret manual or other knowledges. Performing it at a location with evil Feng Shui could increase the chance of obtaining information.

Text.Name: ClosedDoor
Text.Desc: Enter a meditated state to self-cultivate. It will quickly consume one's lifespan and stamina. Gain Cultivation quickly and increases max Qi.

Text.Name: ClosedDoor_Gong1
Text.Desc: Secret meditation method recorded in the Sixteen Supreme Steps Law. Visualize a water mirror in the spiritual realm to enter the state of meditation within meditation, quickly generating stamina by consuming lifespan. Within this state, the practitioner's spirit enters the void. As such, even his thoughts are brought to a halt; therefore Cultivation is not increased during this time.

Text.Name: ClosedDoor_Gong4
Text.Desc: Secret meditation method recorded in the Jade Purity Immortal Law, allowing one's spirit to travel to the Primordial Realm at the beginning of heaven and earth. It is more efficient and costs lesser lifespan compared to regular meditation techniques.

Text.Name: AbsorbLing_Aoe
Text.Desc: Go to the designated location to absorb the Qi within its environment.

Text.Name: AbsorbLing_Live
Text.Desc: Use on a living being without cultivation experience, consuming its lifespan to increase your Qi.

Text.Name: AbsorbLing_Body
Text.Desc: Transmute a body's blood and flesh to increase your Qi.

Text.Name: AbsorbLing_Thing
Text.Desc: Use on buildings, plants and minerals on the map to absorb their Qi. The more Qi the target possesses and the higher your max Qi is, the faster your speed of absorption will be.

Text.Name: AbsorbLing_Item
Text.Desc: Use on an item to absorb its Qi for your own use.

Text.Name: Healing_Damage
Text.Desc: Set your power in motion to cure a target's Inner Injuries. The healing effect is related to the amount of the healer's Qi.

Text.Name: BuildBody
Text.Desc: Regenerate a target's limb, reforging all of their lost body parts.

Text.Name: RobBodyLow
Text.Desc: Low-level possessing technique. Seize the body of a living being with no cultivation experience. However, a bulk of the user's cultivation experience will be lost, causing soul incompatibility as a result.

Text.Name: RobBodyHigh
Text.Desc: Advanced possessing technique. Completely seize the body of a living being with no cultivation experience, but a bulk of the user's cultivation experience will be lost.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_1
Text.Desc: Absorb the lifespan of a living being with no cultivation experience, increasing one's own cultivation experience and Inspiration. More effective on targets with better Physique.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_1_Gong9
Text.Desc: Harness the power of the six realms of existence to initiate the absorption magic of Inner Cauldron, allowing one to more efficiently absorb the lifespan of a living being with no cultivation experience, increasing one's own experience and gaining Inspiration. More effective on targets with better Physique.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_2
Text.Desc: Create an illusionary realm to seduce a living being of the same race as the user with no cultivation experience of the opposite sex, absorbing their lifespan to increase one's own experience and gaining Inspiration. More effective on targets with higher Charisma.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_2_Gong7
Text.Desc: Create an illusionary realm to seduce a living being of the same race as the user with no cultivation experience of the opposite sex, absorbing their lifespan to increase one's own experience and gaining Inspiration. More effective on targets with higher Charisma.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_3
Text.Desc: Seize the body of a living being with no cultivation experience, transmute and harness its power to increase your own cultivation experience while gaining Inspiration. More effective with targets of higher Intelligence.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_3_Gong11
Text.Desc: Harness Nether forces to transmute the soul of a living being with no cultivation experience, thus increasing one's own experience and gaining Inspiration. More effective with targets of higher Intelligence.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_4
Text.Desc: Perform soul-smelting torture on a living being with no cultivation experience of the same race as the user, inflicting enormous pain on them. and takes great pleasure in it.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_5
Text.Desc: Target a living being with no cultivation experience of the same race as the user. If the target is in extreme mood (mood bar above 160 or below 40), gain Inspiration and cultivation experience from it. Once the miracle is enacted, its effect will persist indefinitely. The more extreme the target's Mood is, the stronger the miracle's effect will be. \nFor each target you enact it on, the base value of your own Mental State and Mood are reduced, and your target become more prone to anger. You can stop performing the miracle by reusing it on the same target.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_6
Text.Desc: Learn Miracle: Soul Infection\nRelease on an uncultivated being the same kind as yours, attach a wisp of your primordial spirit onto it and convert the Foundation of the infected target into your Cultivation and Inspiration of equivalent number everyday at 0:00. \nFor each unit you infect, your mind will be damaged and soul split, and the target will be weakened due to the parasite. You can stop performing the miracle by reusing it on the same target.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_7
Text.Desc: Offer a living being with no cultivation experience of the same race as the user as sacrifice to the demonic soul, which will take several organs of the sacrifice at random, and grant the user a large amount of experience and Inspiration in exchange. The stronger the target's Five Attributes, the greater the effects of the sacrifice.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_8
Text.Desc: Cast a spell and grant a living being with no cultivation experience of the same race as the user with a positive mood status.

Text.Name: PlantGrowUp
Text.Desc: Concentrate your primeval Qi and infuse it into a target plant, significantly increasing its growth rate. Lasts 1 day. Less effective on plants of higher tiers. This method is extremely damaging to your primeval Qi, use with care.

Text.Name: PlantGrowUp_Gong1
Text.Desc: Prompt up the Qi of heaven and earth and infuse it into the target plant, slightly increasing its growth rate by 7 days. Less effective on plants of higher tiers.

Text.Name: PlantGrowUp_Gong9
Text.Desc: Utilizing pure and refined Qi of the Wood element to fully vitalize the life force of a plant, significantly increasing its growth rate for 1 day. Less effective on plants of higher tiers.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_9_1
Text.Desc: Consume 10 years of the user's lifespan to improve their abilities for a short period of time and recover Qi.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_9_2
Text.Desc: Consume 10 years of the user's lifespan to improve their abilities for a short period of time and recover Qi.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_9_3
Text.Desc: Consume 10 years of the user's lifespan to improve their abilities for a short period of time and recover Qi.

Text.Name: AbsorbGong_10
Text.Desc: Cast a spell on a living being with no cultivation experience, removing all of its temporary mood status.

Text.Name: LingStoneMake
Text.Desc: Condense every 5000 Qi into a Spirit Stone. This process will continue indefinitely until you stop it or there is insufficient Qi.

Text.Name: LingCrystalMake
Text.Desc: Condense Qi into Spirit Crystal.

Text.Name: PrayForRain
Text.Desc: Bring about a rain through miracle. However, this course of action interferes with the ways of heaven and will diminish one's lifespan.

Text.Name: PrayForSun
Text.Desc: Bring about a sunny weather through miracle. However, this course of action interferes with the ways of heaven and will diminish one's lifespan.

Text.Name: PrayForRain_FeiHorse
Text.Desc: Press Fei'talent and make a rain.

Text.Name: PrayForSun_LuShuHorse
Text.Desc: Press Lushu's talent and dispel clouds.

Text.Name: PrayForRainstorm
Text.Desc: Bring about a rainstorm through miracle in winter and summer. However, this course of action interferes with the ways of heaven and will diminish one's lifespan.

Text.Name: PrayForZhenShuiJieJie_Gong1
Text.Desc: Utilize great magic power to place a waterfield within the designated area, significantly decreasing the temperature of the surroundings. Significantly increases natural resilience and Qi recovery rate of all friendly characters. Only one field may exist at any given time.

Text.Name: PrayForFohn
Text.Desc: Summon a gust of foehn wind through miracle in summer and autumn. However, this course of action interferes with the ways of heaven and will diminish one's lifespan.

Text.Name: PrayForZhenHuoJieJie_Gong10
Text.Desc: Utilize great magic power to place a burning field in the designated area, significantly increasing the temperature of the surroundings. Significantly increases Magic Power of all friendly characters. Only one field may exist at any given time.

Text.Name: PrayForDustStorm
Text.Desc: Bring about a sandstorm through miracle in winter and spring. However, this course of action interferes with the ways of heaven and will diminish one's lifespan.

Text.Name: PrayForMiasma
Text.Desc: Bring about a cloud of miasma through miracle in spring and summer. However, this course of action interferes with the ways of heaven and will diminish one's lifespan.

Text.Name: PrayForLightningStorm
Text.Desc: Bring about a thunderstorm through miracle in summer and autumn. However, this course of action interferes with the ways of heaven and will diminish one's lifespan.

Text.Name: PrayForBeiDouJianJie_Gong8
Text.Desc: Utilize great magic power to place a swordfield in the designated area, significantly increasing the power of artifacts for all friendly characters. Only one field may exist at any given time.

Text.Name: Healing_Physique
Text.Desc: Consume 60 years of lifespan and a large amount of Qi to perform a thorough Cleansing for a living being with no cultivation experience, increasing their Constitution by at least 20%. The lower its initial value, the greater the effect will be. Can only be perform once on a target during its lifetime.

Text.Name: Healing_Intelligence
Text.Desc: Consume 60 years of lifespan and a large amount of Qi to thoroughly enlighten a living being with no cultivation experience, increasing their Intelligence by at least 20%. The lower its initial value, the greater the effect will be. Can only be perform once on a target during its lifetime.

Text.Name: Healing_Charisma
Text.Desc: Consume 60 years of lifespan and a large amount of Qi to reconstruct the body and spirit of a living being with no cultivation experience, increasing their Charisma by at least 20%. The lower its initial value, the greater the effect will be. Can only be perform once on a target during its lifetime.

Text.Name: Healing_Perception
Text.Desc: Consume 60 years of lifespan and a large amount of Qi to activate the Third Eye on a living being with no cultivation experience, increasing their Perception by at least 20%. The lower its initial value, the greater the effect will be. Can only be perform once on a target during its lifetime.

Text.Name: Magic_Plant_Pee
Text.Desc: Water plants and make them mature faster. Only useable via a pet's behavior, can't be used manually.

Text.Name: Magic_Healing_LingShou
Text.Desc: Heals a disciple's inner injuries. Only useable via a pet's behavior, can't be used manually.

Text.Name: Magic_Healing_Hot
Text.Desc: Heals a disciple's heatstroke. Only useable via a pet's behavior, can't be used manually.

Text.Name: Magic_Healing_Freeze
Text.Desc: Heals a disciple's frostbite. Only useable via a pet's behavior, can't be used manually.
